definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: China moves more than 10 times as much freight per kilometer of its train routes than the global average.
sentences.chinese: 中国铁路每公里货运量是世界平均值的十倍。

sentences.english: Airports say overall passenger numbers dropped 5 percent in Europe last year.
sentences.chinese: 而欧洲的机场则表示去年的客运量下降了5%。

sentences.english: Air cargo has continued to decline, a further demonstration of the global economic downturn.
sentences.chinese: 航空货运量也仍旧下跌，进一步显示全球经济低迷。

sentences.english: Airline passenger volume has dropped by 20 percent.
sentences.chinese: 航空客运量已经下降了20%。

sentences.english: Traffic between the two countries grew 12 percent last year.
sentences.chinese: 两国间的客运量去年增长了12%。

sentences.english: More dry matter can be carted per load of a given cubic capacity .
sentences.chinese: 在一定体积的每次载运量中有较多的干物质。

sentences.english: The railways will carry a far higher proportion of freight traffic.
sentences.chinese: 铁路系统将承担比例高得多的货运量。

sentences.english: Last year was the best year in the history of the company by number of passengers.
sentences.chinese: 自公司成立以来，去年是客运量最大的一年。

sentences.english: Therefore research of flight segment volume forecasting is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 因此航段运量预测的研究是非常必要的。

sentences.english: HKIA also saw remarkable cargo growth in the previous few years.
sentences.chinese: 香港国际机场也出现显着的货运量增长在过去几年中。

sentences.english: EasyJet was second with 46.1 million passengers.
sentences.chinese: 易捷航空以4610万的客运量名列第二。

sentences.english: However, the increase in activity does come at a price.
sentences.chinese: 但是，货运量的上升是有代价的。

sentences.english: Airport passenger traffic rose more than 70 percent on-year in the first half of 2010.
sentences.chinese: 2010年上半年，机场客运量同比增长70%以上。

sentences.english: It expects to carry 1.5 million passengers through OPO per year.
sentences.chinese: 波尔图运营基地每年的客运量预计达150万。

sentences.english: More dry matter can be carted per load of a given cubic capacity.
sentences.chinese: 在一定体积的每次载运量中有较多的干物质。

sentences.english: Finally, the prediction of passanger traffic capacity for a railway bureau is given as an example.
sentences.chinese: 最后，作者用本文方法作出了某铁路局客运量的预报。

definition: ton-kilometer (unit of capacity of transport system)
